backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, and many public types for articles, profiles, subscriptions, journals, and editorial data.
backend/migration.mo: Adds a default Editor-in-Chief entry when no editorial members exist, otherwise passes existing data through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying affected frontend pages and components for Editor-in-Chief label correctness.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend page and component.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining pre-deployment checks and steps for promoting the build to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root element and loading the main frontend entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global providers, and application layout for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Countdown component that calculates and displays time remaining until the monthly deadline.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing submission deadline, contact info, social links, terms link, and visitor counter.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, search, auth state handling, and responsive menus.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Animated loading screen showing plant‑growth SVG based on progress or timed animation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for collecting and submitting initial user profile details using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: Dialog for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries with validation and mutation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorCounter.t: Local‑storage based visitor counter component displaying incrementing visit count.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook managing Internet Identity auth client, identity state, and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, news, blog posts, and admin resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables, light/dark themes, and base typography/styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an About and Contact page with mission info, founders, and a contact form with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an About page component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with tabs for managing news, blog posts, articles, editorial members, journals, and terms placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleSubmissionPage: Provides a form for authenticated users with subscriptions to upload and submit article files with progress tracking.
Renders a detailed author guidelines page outlining manuscript formatting rules, required sections, and citation requirements.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user dashboard with profile info, article list, and subscription status, handling authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/EditorialBoardPage.ts: Fetches and displays editorial board members with profile images, roles, and academic details using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Provides a form for initiating password reset, currently using a placeholder notification until backend support is added.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero banner and sections for news, blogs, magazines, reviews, and article previews fetched from queries.
frontend/src/pages/JournalsPage.tsx: Displays the current journal issue and an archive filtered by year, with download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides an email/password login form with validation and placeholder authentication logic.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows news and blog posts in tabbed sections, fetching and listing items with dates and content.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for a future notice board feature.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry, contact support, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe session status, activates subscriptions, and shows success or error states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Renders a signup form with validation and placeholder registration logic.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Renders subscription plans, handles Stripe checkout session creation, and shows setup or error alerts based on authentication and admin/payment config state.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: Fetches and displays Terms and Conditions content with loading and error states using styled UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and scanning paths using plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project's schema version and a detailed summary of existing features, capabilities, and system behavior.
